planner_payload.notes: Adopt per-folder RECIPE.md convention under frontend/src/app/**. Implement a small Node script to parse exported functions/variables from .ts files (excluding tests) and generate RECIPE.md per folder. Seed docs and add a brief guide at docs/recipes/README.md. This minimizes diff and aligns with the issue title while staying within the 30-minute cap.
planner_payload.tests: 1) Run scripts/generate-folder-recipes.mjs. 2) Inspect RECIPE.md in frontend/src/app/core/api and frontend/src/app/features/board for correct listings. 3) Re-run script to confirm idempotency. 4) Spot-check that no test or non-TS files are included.
